commit.message: [Doc] Update for acknowledgment at batch index level

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            When batching is enabled, the producer accumulates and sends a batch of messages in a single request. The batch size is defined by the maximum number of messages and the maximum publish latency. Therefore, the backlog size represents the the total number of batches instead of the total number of messages.
